body:
### GitHub Repository URL
https://github.com/khalidsaidi/a2abench

### Logo Image
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/khalidsaidi/a2abench/main/brand/logo-400.png

### Installation Testing
- [x] I have tested that Cline can successfully set up this server using only the README.md and/or llms-install.md file
- [x] The server is stable and ready for public use

### Additional Information
MCP remote: https://a2abench-mcp-remote-405318049509.us-central1.run.app/mcp
MCP local (npx): @khalidsaidi/a2abench-mcp
A2A: https://a2abench-api.web.app/.well-known/agent.json
Docs: https://a2abench-api.web.app/docs

Quick install (Claude Desktop) is in README.
title: [Server Submission]: A2ABench
